message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $19,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the product, $19,000 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind.  Could you do $17,000? That feels like a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $17,000 is still outside of my budget.  I'm firm on $14,000.  If that doesn't work for you, I'll have to go with another seller.
